page.title: 18 LOCAL GOVERNMENT
page.content: The following is information from the Electoral Register for the Parish of Rockhampton 1985. The number of electors is 128 representing 57 addresses. Parliamentary Constituency is Northavon European Constituency is Bristol Polling District is Rockhampton Electoral Division is Thornbury District is Oldbury-on-Severn Ward Parish is Rockhampton There is a three tier system of local government operating - County Council, District Council and Parish Council. At the Northavon District Council meeting on 4th March 1985 a new general rate was set for Rockhampton of 208.2p in the pound. The general rate is 205.4p in the pound. Additional items of the general rate is 2.8p in the pound.
